summary: Lasagna is a type of wide, flat pasta used to make a traditional Italian dish. It's made by layering pasta with meat sauce, b√©chamel sauce, vegetables, and cheeses like ricotta, mozzarella, and Parmesan. The dish is then baked in an oven and topped with melted cheese. Once baked, it's cut into squares or rectangles for serving. Lasagna is believed to be one of the oldest types of pasta.
title: Lasagna
